overview:
Richard Bruton joined Nephila Capital in November 2007 as part of the analytics group responsible for the design and development of tools and methodologies to support pricing and risk management functions for both catastrophe and weather-linked contracts.

Mr. Bruton began his career in the UK providing retail banking solutions for the Chelsea Building Society. Since then he has worked for a variety of financial institutions including Citibank and HSBC in London, Hong Kong and Bermuda primarily in a technology related capacity. Prior to joining Nephila Mr. Bruton worked for five years at Endurance Specialty Insurance Company in Bermuda as part of their analytics team responsible for the design and development of solutions related to pricing property catastrophe risk.

Mr. Bruton holds the FRM designation from the Global Association of Risk Professionals (GARP), is a Microsoft Certified Application Developer and a CFA Level II candidate. Phone: 298-7739
